name: Bengalis in Hyderabad
overview:
A complete portal for the Bengalis in Hyderabad. Everything a bengali would need to know when and where in Hyderabad.

Started in 2006, it aimed to grow from being just a mere website to a physical existence. It has developed itself as a social networking platform targeted to the bengali population which choose to migrate to Hyderabad and also those who are permanent settlers in Hyderabad.

Being a neutral website, it does not limit itself to any particular associated but provides news, events and updates about all the major and minor bengali associations in Hyderabad as and when available.

It has successfully conducted events to keep the bengali populated together attached to their culture in Hyderabad. The major USP of the website is its members. They have been the prime strength of the organisation.

Bengalis in Hyderabad is popularly known as BiH in Hyderabad.
